articles.content:
Hannah Gadsby is opening up about why they're refusing to talk about Dave Chappelle in their latest Netflix comedy special.

articles.title: Shueyville-native named ‘Female Artist of the Year’ by Academy of Country Music - KCRG
articles.description: An eastern Iowa native is receiving a special honor for her music.
articles.content:
SHUEYVILLE, Iowa (KCRG) - An eastern Iowa native is receiving a special honor for her music.
